name: Achim's project portfolio
body:
### [LXC (LibXConvolver)](https://github.com/AchimTuran/LibXConvolver) LXC is a highly optimized cross platform open source library for [fast convolution](https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=Convolution#Fast_convolution_algorithms). The library has a simple API, which can be used for real application, prototyping or as a tutorial on how to use the included functions to develop more complex applications.

### [asplib (Achim's Signal Processing LIBrary)](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/) This is my cross platform C/C++ signal processing library. At the moment it includes the following features: - A cross platform biquad filter class with factory design pattern to create filters with different processor optimizations - Frame buffer, frame ring buffer and normal buffer implementations through a C/C++ template class interface - An easy to use PortAudio interface class for rapid prototyping of C/C++ audio processing algorithms - The project is still under development and features where constanly added from time to time. For more informations just follow this [link](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/) to my github.com repository.

### [adsp.template](https://github.com/AchimTuran/adsp.template) It's a framework for developing new audio add-ons for Kodi's new Audio DSP extension point. I'm still improving the code during development of adsp.biquad.filters and adsp.xconvolver. After both add-ons are finished I will update the (doxygen documentation](http://wisler.bplaced.de/xbmc-adsp-addons/) of it.

### adsp.xconvolver adsp.xconvolver is convolution engine addon for Kodi's audio processing system. It's based on [LibXConvolver](https://github.com/AchimTuran/LibXConvolver) and [asplib](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/).
